front.title: Computing and Network Information Awareness (CNIA) system architecture for CATS

abstract.t: This document describes a Computing and Network Information Awareness (CNIA)system architecture for Computing-Aware Traffic Steering (CATS). Based on the CATS framework, this document furtherly describes a proposal detailed awareness architecture about the network information and computing information. It includes a new comomponent and the corresponding interfaces and work flows in the CATS control plane.
